comment: Hands-on QA manager with both site presence and EU food production compliance
job_description: Food Production Quality Manager in Verres. Valpinsa Company S.r.l. specializes in Italian pizzas, pinsas and focaccias, expanding production for international markets. The role focuses on stabilizing baking quality, investigating defects, implementing checklists and standards, supporting production teams with clear SOPs, and building a culture of quality. Candidates should have experience with food production quality, ovens, proofing, cold storage or packaging lines, incident investigations, and fluent Italian. Contract role in Verres with relocation support and competitive pay.
